modifiers.name: Rune of Poison - Base Modifier
modifiers.action: (context) => { context.damageParts.push({ dice: 'd4', type: 'poison', source: 'Rune of Poison - Base' });if(context.target) context.target.addStatusEffect({id: 'weakPoison', duration: 3, stack: 1}); }

modifiers.name: Rune of Poison - Empowered Modifier
modifiers.action: (context) => { context.damageParts.push({ dice: 'd6', type: 'poison', source: 'Rune of Poison - Empowered' }); context.target.addStatusEffect({id: 'weakPoison', duration: 3, stack: 1}); }
